text: Intersubjective, relational affect-focused psychotherapy is not the 'talking cure' but the 'affect communicating cure.'
author: Allan Schore

text: Shame is the experience of one's felt sense of self disintegrating in relation to a dysregulating other
author: Pat DeYoung

text: I believe the key to healing is not knowing what happened but transforming how our younger selves still remember it.
author: Janina Fischer
